attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please take 84% from the RBS bonuses and 43% of lloyds bonuses and all Northern Rock's bonuses if we the people own those % of these banks

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
